value.stringValue: The landing page for {!$Record.Name} has been live for 30 days, please review.

formulas.name: forServiceName
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Opportunity__r.VIP__c}=true, "VIP " + {!$Record.Account__r.Name} + " - IDX Tool", IF({!$Record.Opportunity__r.Semi_Custom_Pod__c}=true, "SCP " + {!$Record.Account__r.Name} + " - IDX Tool", {!$Record.Account__r.Name} + " - IDX Tool"))

value.stringValue: All modules have been completed, please review required items and submit to ‘Website Draft’ for build out.

Please create Presence Account and User using information in the New Sales Opportunity. Additionally, please enable In-App Onboarding. When creating the Platform Account, please pre-fill the information in the Platform: (1) Company Name (2) Company Email (3) Phone Number (4) Website URL (5) Address (6) MLS Board
Required: Please add or confirm the website domain on the onboarding service - {!$Record.Name} - to expedite IDX approval and/or SEO Migration Audit.
All modules have been completed, please review required items and submit to ‘Website Draft’ for build out.

Please create Presence Account and User using information in the New Sales Opportunity. Additionally, please enable In-App Onboarding. When creating the Platform Account, please pre-fill the information in the Platform: (1) Company Name (2) Company Email (3) Phone Number (4) Website URL (5) Address (6) MLS Board

textTemplates.name: bodyModulesComplete
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName},
Your new IAO client, {!$Record.Name}, completed all modules, please reach out to the client to schedule a welcome call and change the service status in Salesforce.

textTemplates.name: bodyModulesInProgress
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}, Your new IAO client, {!$Record.Name}, has accepted their invite to the Presence Platform. Please keep an eye out for the email notification letting you know that the client has completed all modules. Once they accept, please make sure to update the service status to “Modules Complete”.

textTemplates.name: bodyNewIAOClient
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}! You have been assigned a new IAO client, {!$Record.Name}. We’ll be inviting them to the Presence Platform shortly.

textTemplates.name: bodyPendingInvitation
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}, Your new IAO client, {!$Record.Name}, has been invited to the Presence Platform. Please keep an eye out for the email notification letting you know that the client has accepted their invite. Once they accept, please make sure to update the service status to ‘Modules in Progress’.

textTemplates.name: bodyWDReview
textTemplates.text:
Hi, {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}!
The Website Draft from your IAO Client, {!$Record.Name}, is now ready for review! Please check the Service in Salesforce.

textTemplates.name: bodyWebsiteDraft
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.Owner:User.FirstName}, Your new IAO client, {!$Record.Name}, completed all modules, please reach out to the client to schedule a welcome call and change the service status in Salesforce.
